============================================
core/uvm/uvm_config_db
============================================

module foo;
    initial  begin
        uvm_config_db::get(null, "", "some_type", m_some_type);
        uvm_config_db #(some_type)::get(null, "", "some_type", m_some_type);
        if(!uvm_config_db #(some_type)::get(null, "", "some_type", m_some_type)) begin
           `uvm_error(get_name(), $sformatf("Error! Couldn not find %s", m_some_type))
        end
    end
endmodule

----

(source_file
  (module_declaration
    (module_ansi_header
      (module_keyword)
      name: (simple_identifier))
    (initial_construct
      (statement_or_null
        (statement
          (statement_item
            (seq_block
              (statement_or_null
                (statement
                  (statement_item
                    (subroutine_call_statement
                      (subroutine_call
                        (method_call
                          (primary
                            (hierarchical_identifier
                              (simple_identifier)))

                            name: (simple_identifier)
                            arguments: (list_of_arguments
                              (expression
                                (primary))

                                    (string_literal
                                      (quoted_string)))))

                                  (hierarchical_identifier
                                    (simple_identifier))))))))))))

                            (simple_identifier)

                                      (expression

                                            (simple_identifier))))))))))

                        (expression
                          operator: (unary_operator)

                            (function_subroutine_call
                              (subroutine_call
                                (method_call

                                          (hierarchical_identifier
                                            (simple_identifier))))))))))))

                        (statement

                                    (text_macro_usage
                                      (simple_identifier)

                                        (actual_argument
                                          (param_expression
                                            (mintypmax_expression

                                                  (function_subroutine_call
                                                    (subroutine_call
                                                      (tf_call
                                                        (hierarchical_identifier
                                                          (simple_identifier))))))))))

                                          (param_expression
                                            (mintypmax_expression
                                              (expression
                                                (primary
                                                  (function_subroutine_call
                                                    (subroutine_call
                                                      (system_tf_call
                                                        (system_tf_identifier)
                                                        (list_of_arguments
                                                          (expression
                                                            (primary
                                                              (primary_literal

                                                                  (quoted_string)))))
